verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Bildad|strong="H1085"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Shuhite|strong="H7747"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

\w Doth|strong="H4941"\w* God \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*? \w or|strong="H4941"\w* \w doth|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* \w pervert|strong="H5791"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*?

\w If|strong="H2398"\w* \w thy|strong="H7971"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*:

\w If|strong="H2603"\w* thou wouldest \w seek|strong="H7836"\w* \w diligently|strong="H7836"\w* \w unto|strong="H7836"\w* God, \w and|strong="H2603"\w* \w make|strong="H2603"\w* \w thy|strong="H2603"\w* \w supplication|strong="H2603"\w* \w to|strong="H2603"\w* \w the|strong="H2603"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*;

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* wert \w pure|strong="H2134"\w* \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*; \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H3477"\w* \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thee|strong="H7999"\w*, \w and|strong="H6664"\w* \w make|strong="H7999"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H7999"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H7999"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3966"\w* though thy \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w small|strong="H4705"\w*, yet thy latter end should \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w increase|strong="H7685"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w inquire|strong="H7592"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H7592"\w*, \w of|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w age|strong="H1755"\w*, \w and|strong="H7223"\w* apply thyself \w to|strong="H1755"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fathers \w have|strong="H7223"\w* \w searched|strong="H2714"\w* \w out|strong="H2714"\w*:

(\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H8543"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* earth \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*:)

\w Shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w teach|strong="H3384"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* tell thee, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w utter|strong="H3318"\w* \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*?

Whilst \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w yet|strong="H5750"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* greenness, \add and \add*\w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H6998"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w*, \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w withereth|strong="H3001"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \add other \add*\w herb|strong="H2682"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* are \w the|strong="H3605"\w* paths \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* God; \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w man|strong="H2611"\w* \w shall|strong="H8615"\w* perish:

Whose \w confidence|strong="H4009"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* break \w in|strong="H1004"\w* sunder, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* whose \w trust|strong="H4009"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* spiderâ€™s \w web|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w lean|strong="H8172"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*: \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* thereby, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w endure|strong="H5975"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w green|strong="H7373"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w shoots|strong="H3127"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w garden|strong="H1593"\w*.

\w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* \w are|strong="H1004"\w* wrapped \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w heap|strong="H1530"\w*, \w he|strong="H1004"\w* beholdeth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* stones.

\w If|strong="H7200"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H1104"\w* \w from|strong="H7200"\w* \w his|strong="H7200"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \w then|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w deny|strong="H3584"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w I|strong="H7200"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w thee|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w out|strong="H6779"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* others \w spring|strong="H6779"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cast|strong="H3988"\w* \w away|strong="H3988"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w perfect|strong="H8535"\w* \w man|strong="H8535"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* uphold \w the|strong="H2388"\w* evil-doers.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* \w yet|strong="H5704"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w laughter|strong="H7814"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w thy|strong="H4390"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w shouting|strong="H8643"\w*.
